    • Method Detail

      • applyMotionTarget

        public void applyMotionTarget(MotionTargetLaunchable target)
        Description copied from class: Launchable
        Applies a motion target, changing the state of the Projectile.

        May be overridden (as to generate smoke). A call to super is obligatory.

        Overrides:
        applyMotionTarget in class Launchable
        Parameters:
        target - state to set

      • calculateMotion

        public MotionTargetLaunchable calculateMotion(SimulationState state,
                                              double elapsedTime)
        Description copied from class: Launchable
        Calculates a target of movement. The state is not changed by this method.

        May be overridden to change the velocity. A call to super is obligatory at the end of the overriding method.

        Overrides:
        calculateMotion in class Launchable
        elapsedTime - >= 0
        Returns:
        a MotionTargetProjectile representing the position after the given elapsed timeInFrame

      • clone

        public Projectile clone()
        Specified by:
        clone in class Launchable
        Returns:
        a new Projectile with identical state.

      • DAMAGE_FRONT

        public double DAMAGE_FRONT()
        Description copied from class: Launchable
        Damage the Launchable exerts to a Panzer if hitting a given side directly. Note that this routine is only called on colliding Launchables. For the others, it is irrelevant.

        Every descendant may have its own value.

        Specified by:
        DAMAGE_FRONT in class Launchable

      • DAMAGE_REAR

        public double DAMAGE_REAR()
        Description copied from class: Launchable
        Damage the Launchable exerts to a Panzer if hitting a given side directly. Note that this routine is only called on colliding Launchables. For the others, it is irrelevant.

        Every descendant may have its own value.

        Specified by:
        DAMAGE_REAR in class Launchable

      • DAMAGE_SIDE

        public double DAMAGE_SIDE()
        Description copied from class: Launchable
        Damage the Launchable exerts to a Panzer if hitting a given side directly. Note that this routine is only called on colliding Launchables. For the others, it is irrelevant.

        Every descendant may have its own value.

        Specified by:
        DAMAGE_SIDE in class Launchable

      • detonate

        public void detonate()
        Description copied from class: Launchable
        Is set on collision with an object (if the Launchable participates in collisions). This marks that the Launchable is removed from the simulation.

        Necessity: Directables need to store the information that they are removed from the simulation, so that the Panzer they originate from can remove its uplink.

        Specified by:
        detonate in class Launchable

      • discoverCollision

        Description copied from class: Launchable

        Specified by:

      • FORCE_HIT

        public double FORCE_HIT()
        Description copied from class: Launchable
        The impulse induced on target on hit. Note that this routine is only called on colliding Launchables. For the others, it is irrelevant.

        Every descendant may have its own value.

        Specified by:
        FORCE_HIT in class Launchable

      • LAUNCHER_REFRACTORY_PERIOD

        public double LAUNCHER_REFRACTORY_PERIOD()
        Description copied from class: Launchable
        Time until launcher gear can be reactivated after drop. It is class specific.

        Every descendant may have its own value.

        Specified by:
        LAUNCHER_REFRACTORY_PERIOD in class Launchable

      • MAX_VELOCITY

        public double MAX_VELOCITY()
        Description copied from class: Launchable
        Estimated maximum velocity of this Launchable [m/s]. Note that only for self-propelled Launchables this value will be different from MUZZLE_VELOCITY.

        Every descendant may have its own value.

        Specified by:
        MAX_VELOCITY in class Launchable

        Every descendant may have its own value.
